mapper.insert: insert into shoppingcart (shoppingcart_id, addingcart_time, book_amout, book_id, book_name, book_points, book_price, book_retailprice, cosumer_id) values (#{shoppingcartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addingcartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bookAmout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bookRetailprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cosumerId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update shoppingcart set addingcart_time = #{addingcartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, book_amout = #{bookAmout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, book_points = #{bookPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book_price = #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, book_retailprice = #{bookRetailprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cosumer_id = #{cosumerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where shoppingcart_id = #{shoppingcartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select shoppingcart_id, addingcart_time, book_amout, book_id, book_name, book_points, book_price, book_retailprice, cosumer_id from shoppingcart where shoppingcart_id = #{shoppingcartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select shoppingcart_id, addingcart_time, book_amout, book_id, book_name, book_points, book_price, book_retailprice, cosumer_id from shoppingcart
